Results.ReviewText: I love the way they fit. They do absorb of a lot of wetness. I like the way they stretch so when my child moves around nothing is tight or rubbing. He seems very comfortable in Pampers swaddlers. They are pretty pricey for my personal budget, but they are really worth it. I am unable to buy them all of the time unfortunately, but when I can I love them! I actually have not had any leaks with them yet.
Results.Title: They do a great job

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: Received an incentive for this review

Results.ReviewText: I been using this Pampers for all my kids I don't change them for any other they have an excellent quality I definitely recommend them
Results.Title: 5 of 5 stars

Results.ReviewText: I love the 360 cruisers diapers specifically because they don’t have the straps. My daughter has been ripping off her diapers a lot more and with no straps she can’t figure out how to get it off anymore. They are really good at night. I only change her diaper once in the night if that. She rarely has leakage or an explosion lol. Only time it would get to that point is if she’d been running around too long with a soggy diaper which I don’t tend to do.
Results.Title: Love these !!

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: Received an incentive for this review

Results.ReviewText: My little 12-year-old Adu loves these diapers. They don't leak and are perfect for him. He has had many accidents and these are perfect for him. Thank you Pampers!
Results.Title: My little 12 year old.

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: Received an incentive for this review

Results.ReviewText: My baby boy is almost 3 months old now and we LOVE the baby-Dry diapers! We have never had any leaks or  blow outs with these diapers and they never leave any red marks on my boys chunky lil thighs! I wish I had known about them sooner! We will be stocking up in multiple sizes!
Results.Title: Leak free and cute design

IncentivizedReview.DimensionLabel: Received an incentive for this review

ClientResponses.Response: Adrianna, we're glad to hear your perfect  little chunky monkey is comfortable and dry in Baby Dry! Thank you so much for choosing Pampers and for sharing your experience.
ClientResponses.Name: Ailsa Wallace

Results.ReviewText: I love that these diapers ACTUALLY stay dry and are comfy for my baby girl. She is such a perfect chunky monkey in size 3 at 4 almost 5 months old and these don't leave any marks and fit her thighs awesome!
Results.Title: Really Really amazing!
